snippet: Martin Wolmark, 57, of Monsey, N.Y., received a three-year prison sentence on Monday after he had pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit extortion.
lead_paragraph: Martin Wolmark, 57, of Monsey, N.Y., received a three-year prison sentence on Monday after he had pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit extortion.

headline.main: Rabbi Sentenced for Role in Divorce-Coercion Ring
headline.print_headline: Rabbi Sentenced for Role In Divorce-Coercion Ring
